OrgName.entry: ST WILFRID AND MOTHER OF GOD CREDIT UNION LTD

Desc.entry: Locally based savings and loans co-operative for people aged 18 years and over. People under 18 years can save but not borrow. Membership is restricted to those who are actively involved within the parish of St Wilfrid and Mother of God, Sheffield.

ProvisionPlace.entry: St Wilfrids and Mother of God Church

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Ramp and disabled toilet (through side entrance)

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Saturday evenings and Sunday morning (collection point after Masses), 2nd Thurs in the month at 8pm (collection point)
